title: This Thing = Next Level Portable Gaming
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -  Gamevice Controller (USA Link) -  Gamevice Controller (International) -   The Gamevice is a cool contraption that brings tactile controls to your iPhone or iPad (different versions). The controls feel great and truly emulate a console controller experience. If you already of an iPad here's a way to step up the gaming experience especially for longer gaming sessions.  From the manufacturer -  - Legit Console Control - Dual Analog Sticks, Sturdy Twin Triggers, The Classic D-Pad and a button layout you've been using for years  - Transforms your iPad mini into the most powerful gaming handheld in the world  - Over 650 compatible games and growing!  - Check out the free Gamevice Live app for all of the known controller-compatible games available on iTunes, with options to filter by category including free or paid titles.  - Made for iPad mini. This product will fit ipad mini 2/3 perfectly . It fits the iPad mini 1/4 just fine but the stability is not the same as others.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
